features: Well Made: This set includes two curtain panels, expertly crafted from premium cotton fabric, offering durability and a luxurious feel. Each panel measures 50" width by 84" length, providing ample coverage for your windows while adding a touch of elegance to your home decor.
Rich Material: These curtains are crafted from high-quality 100% cotton, which provides a soft and luxurious touch while add an airy and dreamy beauty to your room.

Light Filtering: The white curtains can allow the right amount of natural light through to bring your room a hazy and softer vision, keep you away from someone’s glance from outside and provide you some privacy.

Wide Usage: These curtains are available for multiple options in colors and sizes, which is ideal choice for bedroom, living room, dining room, kids’ room, nursery, kitchen, hotel, office, or even outdoor decorations. Also, you can use Decorating for the French Country style, modern farmhouse style, rustic/country style, for Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, family party, picnic party.
Easy Care: Machine wash colors separately wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry, low iron. No hooks or rings are required, as they effortlessly slide onto your curtain rod.
Back Top Construction: Effortless installation and a clean, modern look.

Versatility: Ideal curtains for bedrooms and living rooms. Transform your living spaces with these premium cotton textured curtains. The impeccable craftsmanship and attention to detail make them a standout addition to any room. Enjoy the perfect blend of functionality and style with Bedding Craft's 100% Cotton Textured Window Curtain Panels.
body.description: Elevate your space with our premium Bedding Craft 100% Cotton Textured Window Curtain Panels. This set of 2 panels, each measuring 50 inches wide by 84 inches long, is crafted to perfection to enhance both your bedroom and living room décor. The light-filtering design adds a touch of elegance, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Naturally light and bright
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with these curtains! I needed to buy three sets to replace my previous curtains which are now too short because I removed the ring clips that had began to rust after years of use in our humid climate. I was looking for something simple, in a natural material and white color, that didn’t block too much light. These curtains were exactly what I was looking for. They are lightweight, but provide the right amount of brightness and security to my bedroom. The texture is subtle, but still noticeable, especially when closed. The packaging of the three sets were not identical, but the product itself all appeared to be the same. I was aware from previous reviewers that there would be shrinkage, so I bought the next size up (which I needed anyway since my rods were hung higher to accommodate for the ring clips that I would not be using anymore). They did shrink even though I washed in cold water and dried at a low temperature, but I didn’t measure exactly how much. After washing, drying and ironing, their length is slightly longer than where I like my curtains to hang, but I think they look nice. They were easy to iron and hang on the rod. For the price, I feel like these are nice quality, and I am glad I bought them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty neutral white & light filtering
reviews.reviewText: Love this curtain. Let’s light in but can’t see in the house. Pretty subtle pattern. Love the neutral white. I don’t see any gray or cream undertones. Perfect. Looks more expensive than is. Hangs nicely. No ironing needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great curtains, amazing price!!
reviews.reviewText: I had been searching for curtain panels for MONTHS before I finally found these. The color is exactly as expected, the fabric feels like great quality, and the price point was perfect. They are not blackout, but more of a light filtering material, which was exactly what I was looking for.I did not experience any shrinking, but I washed on cold and used the “delicate” cycle. When I dried them I used a heatless cycle - air dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice curtains
reviews.reviewText: These were exactly what I was looking for. The material feels thick but they aren’t blackout. They drape very nice and do not look cheap at all. I had bought and returned two other sets from other companies before I settled on these. I haven’t washed them yet so I can’t say anything about shrinkage. I do plant on putting pieces of toilet paper between the folds to keep them from getting out of place but that’s just a Pinterest hack and has nothing to do with the curtains themselves. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice cotton curtains
reviews.reviewText: I wanted real cotton curtains that I could hem and looked good. All the polyester ones were so unattractive and cheap looking. These were exactly what I was looking for and hemmed up beautifully. They are great looking and sturdy.There were a number of errant threads I had to clean up and I wanted to give them five stars but I purchased white curtains and there were two red marks on them about and inch to 1.5 inches long. Looked like a pale red marker and it did not wash out (though I didn’t use bleach). One mark I cut off by hemming them and the other just got hidden in the folds. No one will see it but me. These are affordable, good looking, cotton curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crisp white and good for bedroom
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought white curtains from Ikea as many people have recommended them but found them to be too yellow when sunlight was hitting them. I searched for something more white and came across these and I'm happy I bought them as they are pure white with no hint of yellow. They are not too sheer and they are ok for bedroom privacy.You need to wash them first - I did light drying and then air dried them. They do shrink a little bit so if you do that, they should not shrink if you wash again. Overall, I am very pleased with them, color and materials for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Returning immediately - 8-10" shrinkage
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted the like these - out of the package, the color and fabric weight were just as I expected, and perfect to brighten a basement closet. But because they were deeply creased from the packaging, I tossed them in the washer according to the instructions (cold, delicate). While they washed, I almost bought another pair but wisely waited until the wash cycle was over before committing to another pair. I was surprised (but not really, deep inside) to find that the curtains had shrunk significantly (of course the poly lining didn't, making the shrinking even more ridiculous and insulting). In the photo, the 84" curtains are hanging in an 80" door frame. You can see they're at least 4" too short, and you can see that stupid lining, taunting). So I get to return these and start all over. I'm so tired of getting junk. So, so tired. No standards whatsoever anymore. None.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These panels are beautiful! I purchased 4 for my living room and these are great. The quality is great, cannot beat the price. This is after they were steamed. I did not wash them, however I agree with a previous comment that they may need to be professionally cleaned down the line. They are sheer and filter out some light, but are 100% cotton. Will buy again.
These are not room darkening at all and Color like yellow not natural. I didn’t return because would loose a lot on my shipping . Also had already ironed them .
Perfect nice sewing quality and the linen fabric is beautiful

I am very pleased with the quality of these curtains. They washed well and were easy to hang. They are thick enough to provide privacy but light enough to remain airy. They are not room darkening but are effective at keeping privacy.
We loved the quality of the curtains. They are 100% linen, well made and were very pleased with them!
Je les adore…..il laisse passer la lumière mais je les aimes quand même
